world.name: Eldoria
world.description: Eldoria is a vibrant realm characterized by its enchanting landscapes, ranging from lush forests and towering mountains to sprawling plains and mystical lakes. It is a land rich with ancient magic and diverse cultures, yet it bears the scars of a cataclysmic event that reshaped its history.

Desolate Era.description: A time marked by chaos and destruction, the Desolate Era ended with a cataclysm that shattered the fabric of reality and unleashed dark forces upon Eldoria. The echoes of this era still resonate in the minds and hearts of its survivors.
key_events: The Sundering: A cataclysmic event that fractured the land and released the Echoes.
The Great Collapse: Societal structures crumbled as fear and distrust spread among the populace.

Reclamation Era.description: Following the Desolate Era, the Reclamation Era is a time of rebuilding and rediscovery. Communities emerge from the ashes, striving to restore what was lost while grappling with the legacies of their past.
key_events: The Founding of New Cities: Survivors band together to establish new settlements, leading to a resurgence of trade and culture.
The Awakening of the Seers: Individuals with the gift of foresight begin to surface, offering glimpses into potential futures.

key_locations.name: Feywood Forest
key_locations.description: A vast, enchanted forest filled with luminous flora and mystical fauna. It is said to be a sanctuary for ancient spirits and holds secrets of the past.
notable_features: The Glimmering Grove: A sacred area where the veil between worlds is thin, often visited by seers.
Whispering Pines: Trees that seem to communicate through rustling leaves, believed to share wisdom of the ancients.

key_locations.name: The Ruins of Eldorath
key_locations.description: The remnants of a once-great city, now a haunting reminder of the Desolate Era. Crumbling structures and overgrown vegetation conceal powerful artifacts and dark secrets.
notable_features: The Echoing Hall: A cavernous space where the whispers of the Echoes can be heard, drawing in the curious and the brave.
The Obsidian Spire: A towering structure that was a center of power, rumored to be the resting place of the lost artifact.

key_locations.name: The Crystal Lakes
key_locations.description: A series of shimmering lakes that reflect the sky's colors, believed to be infused with magic. Many come here to seek clarity and healing.
notable_features: The Lake of Reflections: A lake said to reveal one's true self, where many have faced their innermost fears.
The Shimmering Isles: Small islands dotted across the lakes, each said to hold unique magical properties.

societies.name: The Seers
societies.description: A group of individuals gifted with foresight, the Seers play a crucial role in guiding Eldoria's future. They are often revered but also feared for their knowledge of potential disasters.
beliefs: The future is malleable, shaped by choices and actions.
Visions are both a gift and a burden, revealing truths that may not be ready to be faced.

societies.name: The Warriors of Elysium
societies.description: A faction of skilled fighters dedicated to protecting Eldoria and its people. They value honor and bravery, often serving as guardians against external threats.
beliefs: Strength lies not only in combat but in unity and trust.
True heroism is defined by sacrifice for the greater good.

societies.name: The Scholars of the Forgotten
societies.description: A group devoted to the study of history and ancient magic. They seek to uncover the truths of the past to prevent history from repeating itself.
beliefs: Knowledge is the key to understanding and preventing future calamities.
The past holds lessons that should not be forgotten.

Mira.description: A gifted seer burdened by haunting visions of a dark future. She is determined to uncover the origins of her powers and the truth behind the Echoes.
traits: Intuitive and empathetic, often feeling the emotions of others.
Haunted by her visions, leading to moments of self-doubt.
goals: To understand the source of her foresight.
To prevent the impending darkness she has seen in her visions.

Rowan.description: A rebellious warrior with an enigmatic lineage, seeking purpose in a world that feels alien to him. He is fiercely loyal and courageous.
traits: Restless and adventurous, often taking risks without considering the consequences.
Possesses a strong sense of justice, driven to protect those he loves.
goals: To discover the truth about his heritage.
To find a place where he truly belongs.

The Echoes.description: Forgotten entities from a bygone age, the Echoes are malevolent forces that manipulate reality to sow chaos and despair. They are manifestations of past fears and regrets, seeking to reclaim their power.
traits: Mysterious and elusive, often appearing in whispers and shadows.
Capable of transforming and adapting to the fears of those they confront.
goals: To consume the life force of Eldoria and plunge it back into darkness.
To reclaim their lost power by exploiting the traumas of the living.

magic_system.name: Resonance Magic
magic_system.description: A form of magic that draws from the harmonious vibrations of the world around them. Practitioners can manipulate elements, emotions, and realities through resonance.

types.name: Elemental Resonance
types.description: Manipulation of elemental forces like fire, water, earth, and air.

types.name: Emotional Resonance
types.description: Ability to influence and sense the emotions of others, often used for healing or manipulation.

types.name: Temporal Resonance
types.description: The rare ability to glimpse into the past or future, often tied to the visions of the Seers.

themes: The struggle between light and darkness, both externally and internally.
The importance of understanding one's past to shape a better future.
The power of unity and trust in overcoming adversity.
